DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter , multinational , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study patient Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus ( T2DM ) . Patients inadequate glycemic control use diet exercise alone , combination metformin , enrol . The primary objective study test hypothesis LY2428757 give patient T2DM inadequately control diet exercise alone , metformin monotherapy , produce significant decrease mean hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) baseline endpoint 12 week compare placebo . Trial consist 12 week double-blind treatment 4-week safety follow-up .
